metadata.source: U.S. Department of Labor - Employment and Training Administration
metadata.title: Significant Provisions of State Unemployment Insurance Laws

monetary_eligibility.description: 1.5x HQW
$2,500; wages in 2 qtrs; at least $250 outside HQ

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 0.9-2.2% of annual wages + DA up to $72

maximum_benefit.formula_description: Weighted schedule of BPW to HQW for # of weeks x WBA

monetary_eligibility.description: 1.5x HQW and 390x minimum wage in 1 qtr; or wages in 2 qtrs with wages in 1 qtr sufficient to qualify for maximum WBA and total BPW >= TWB
monetary_eligibility.other_requirements: Alternative: wages in 2 qtrs with 1 qtr sufficient for max WBA

maximum_benefit.formula_description: 26x WBA or 24x WBA if unemployment rate in prior calendar qtr is less than 5%

monetary_eligibility.description: 35x WBA; wages in 2 qtrs

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 1/26 of the avg of the 4 qtrs in BP

monetary_eligibility.description: $1,300 in HQ, or $900 in HQ with BPW = 1.25x HQ
40x WBA or $2,500, whichever is greater

weekly_benefit.formula_description: Higher of 60% of 1/26 of 2 consecutive HQW capped by 50% of State avg weekly earnings OR 50% of 1/52 BP earnings capped by 55% of State avg weekly earnings

monetary_eligibility.description: 40x WBA

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 1/26 avg of 2 HQs + $15 per dep, up to 5; DA capped at WBA (For construction workers, 1/26 HQ)

monetary_eligibility.description: 36x WBA
1.5x HQW or within $70; not less than $1,950 in 2 qtrs; $1,300 in 1 qtr
1.5x HQW; minimum $3,400; wages in 2 qtrs
Wages in 2 qtrs & 150% x HQW or HQW/21 for WBA w/ total earnings in 2 qtrs totaling at least 40x WBA

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 1/42 of wages in highest 2 qtrs or 1/21 HQW

monetary_eligibility.description: 26x WBA; wages in 2 qtrs
1.25x HQW; minimum $1,872 in 1 qtr

maximum_benefit.formula_description: Weighted schedule of BPW to HQW for # of weeks x WBA

monetary_eligibility.description: $1,600; $440 outside HQ

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 47% of claimant's AWW in 2 highest qtrs

maximum_benefit.formula_description: Lesser of 26x WBA (plus DA) or BP wages

monetary_eligibility.description: 1.5x HQW totaling at least $2,500 in last 2 qtrs; not less than $4,200 in BP
1.25x HQW; 3.5% of statewide AAW in HQ; 1/2 HQW in qtr not the HQ

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 1/23 HQW or 1/19-1/22 HQW for claimants with deps

monetary_eligibility.description: 30x WBA; wages in 2 qtrs
1.5x HQW; 8x WBA in last 2 qtrs; at least $1,500 outside HQ
$1,200 total BPW; wages in 2 qtrs; 1.5x HQW

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 1/25 of the avg of wages in 4 qtrs of BP

monetary_eligibility.description: 2x AWW in 2 different BP qtrs; total BPW = 6x AWW

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 1/22 avg wages paid in 2 highest qtrs of BP + $25 per dep up to 75% of WBA

monetary_eligibility.description: 1.5x HQW; $1,176.01 in HQ; $1,800 in 2 qtrs

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 1/24 HQW + $8 per dep up to 5 deps

monetary_eligibility.description: 30x WBA; $6,300 minimum

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 50% AWW + $25 per dep (no cap on DA)

monetary_eligibility.description: Total BPW = 1.5x HQW; wages in at least 2 BP qtrs; at least $4,097 in HQ; or wages in at least 2 BP qtrs; BPW at least 20x State AWW

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 4.1% HQW + $12.66 for each dep up to 5

earnings_disregard.description: If earnings < 1.5x WBA, reduction is 50 cents per $1 earned; if > 1.5x WBA, reduction is $1 per $1 earned; Total benefits plus earnings cannot exceed 1.5x WBA

monetary_eligibility.description: 5.3% of State AAW

weekly_benefit.formula_description: Higher of 50% of 1/13 HQW up to 43% of State AWW or 50% of 1/52 BPW up to 66.67% of State AWW

earnings_disregard.description: WBA reduced by 50 cents for every $1 earned

monetary_eligibility.description: 40x WBA; $780 in HQ; wages in 2 qtrs
1.5x HQW; $1,500 in 1 qtr; or wages in 2 qtrs of BP = 1.5x maximum TWB

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 4% of the avg of the 2 HQWs

monetary_eligibility.description: BPW > 1.5x HQW and total wages > 7% of AAW or BPW > 50% of AAW

maximum_benefit.formula_description: Weighted schedule of BPW to HQW for # of weeks x WBA

monetary_eligibility.description: $5,297 in BP; $1,850 in HQW and wages in at least one other quarter of $800
1.5x HQW in BP and $400 in HQ; or wages in 3 of 4 qtrs in BP and $400 in HQ
$2,800; $1,400 in each of 2 qtrs
20 weeks employment at 20x State hourly minimum wage or 1,000x State hourly minimum wage

maximum_benefit.formula_description: Number of weeks worked in base year up to 26x WBA

monetary_eligibility.description: $2,698 in HQW and wages in at least 1 other qtr

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 53.5% of AWW paid in BP qtr in which wages were highest

monetary_eligibility.description: 1.5x HQW; $3,400 in HQ

earnings_disregard.description: Up to 10 hrs of work as long as earnings at or below WBA Max

monetary_eligibility.description: 6x AWW; wages in 2 qtrs of BP

weekly_benefit.formula_description: Last 2 qtrs of BP/52 (must be at least 6x AWW in last two qtrs of BP to establish a WBA)

monetary_eligibility.description: 1.5x HQW; wages in 2 qtrs

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 1/65 of wages in 2 HQs + 1/2 wages in 3rd HQ

maximum_benefit.formula_description: Weighted schedule of BPW to HQW for # of weeks x WBA

monetary_eligibility.description: 20 weeks employment with wages averaging 27.5% of State AWW; wages in 2 qtrs

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 1/2 claimant's AWW + DA of $1-$210 based on claimant's AWW and number of dep

maximum_benefit.formula_description: 20x WBA + 1x WBA for each qualifying week in excess of 20

monetary_eligibility.description: $1,500 and 1.5x HQW or any taxable wages if total wages equal or exceed TWB for year claim was effective
BPW > $1,000 and BPW > 1.5x HQW; or 500 hours of employment in BP
$1,688 in HQ; $2,718 in BP; at least 37% of BPW outside HQ; 18 credit weeks in BP

weekly_benefit.formula_description: (4% HQW + 2) x 0.98 + 2 DA; $5 for 1st dep; $3 for 2nd dep

maximum_benefit.formula_description: Actual number of credit weeks in BP x WBA

monetary_eligibility.description: 40x WBA; $280 minimum; wages in 2 qtrs
1.5x HQW; 200x minimum hourly wage in 1 qtr and 400x minimum hourly wage in BP; or 1,200x minimum hourly wage in BP

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 3.85% of avg high 2 qtrs in BP + greater of $15 or 5% of weekly benefit rate per dep, capped at the greater of $50 or 25% of WBA

monetary_eligibility.description: 1.5x HQW; $4,455 minimum; $1,092 in HQ
$728 in HQ; 20x WBA outside HQ
40x WBA; $780.01 avg wages in highest 2 qtrs; BPW outside HQW > the lesser of 6x WBA or $900

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 1/26 of avg wages paid in 2 highest qtrs

monetary_eligibility.description: 37x WBA; wages in at least 2 qtrs

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 1/25 HQW Capped at 47.6% of AWW in covered employment in TX, calculated annually

monetary_eligibility.description: $5,300 in BP and 1.5x HQW
1.4x HQW and $3,739 in HQ

weekly_benefit.formula_description: Wages in the 2 highest qtrs divided by 45

monetary_eligibility.description: $3,000 in highest 2 qtrs of BP

maximum_benefit.formula_description: Weighted schedule of 2 highest qtrs to WBA for # weeks x WBA

monetary_eligibility.description: 1.5x HQW and $858 in HQ; or $858 in HQ and 39x WBA in BP
680 hours; wages in BP or alternate BP

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 3.85% of avg of high 2 qtrs in BP

monetary_eligibility.description: $2,200 and wages in 2 qtrs

weekly_benefit.formula_description: 55% of 1/52 of median wages in worker's wage class

earnings_disregard.note: For part-time employment there is no deduction if wages earned are less than the WBA

monetary_eligibility.description: 35x WBA, HQ > $1,350 and 4x WBA outside HQ

maximum_benefit.formula_description: Lesser of 40% of BPW or 26x WBA

monetary_eligibility.description: 1.4x HQW; at least 8% of statewide AAW
